option.name: text
option.value: * Provide all code examples in Kotlin.

option.name: text
option.value: Create an .aiexclude file in the root of the project. Include build directories, local.properties and a wildcard for .keystore files. Add an exclude for any secrets.xml files in any of the directories.

option.name: text
option.value: Setup an AGENTS.md file for this project. Include that we should use Compose, Navigation 3, Material 3 and architecture as recommended on https://developer.android.com/topic/architecture/recommendations

option.name: name
option.value: 02.01k fix crash backup if button doesn't wor

option.name: text
option.value: I'm getting the following error in my running application. The error is: FATAL EXCEPTION: main ``` FATAL EXCEPTION: main Process: net.maiatoday.moodsnap, PID: 5579 java.lang.IllegalStateException: The query result was empty, but expected a single row to return a NON-NULL object of type 'net.maiatoday.moodsnap.`data`.MoodEntry'. at net.maiatoday.moodsnap.data.MoodEntryDao_Impl.getEntryById$lambda$0(MoodEntryDao_Impl.kt:217) at net.maiatoday.moodsnap.data.MoodEntryDao_Impl$$ExternalSyntheticLambda0.invoke(D8$$SyntheticClass:0) with tag AndroidRuntime ``` Fix this issue

option.name: name
option.value: 02.02 Investigate mood id for new and updated moods

option.name: text
option.value: Look at the @MoodEntryDao.kt , @MoodEntry.kt and the @AddEditViewModel.kt What I am seeing is that the id is not updated for a new entry and the id is always -1 even though this is an autoGenerated primary key. Why could this be? Suggest some fixes. I can either edit an existing entry or create a new one. Both should work

option.name: text
option.value: Look at the @AddEditViewModel.kt . In the init function I want you to determine if this is a new or an update scenario. Then set a local private value `isNew` to true if it is a new mood. Then set another local variable moodId that is non-nullable to 0 if it is a new mood or set it to the entryId if it is an edit. When the mood is saved use the moodId and the flag to either update or insert. moodId will then always have the correct value.
